'''v0.12.2 alpha'''<ref>https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE/fixforversion/15382</ref> is a minor update to [[Pocket Edition]] and the [[Windows 10 Edition]] Beta released on October 11-14, 2015 with a few bugfixes.<ref>{{tweet|_tomcc|653762628515291138|So, today a 0.12.2 has been released on Android. It addressed a few of bugs but basically that’s it, don’t get too hyped :)|13 Oct 2015}}</ref> This is the last version for FireOS 2.
